MemoryInfobox.description: 'An Arkadian mercenary once told Kassandra, "He who controls the grain, controls the world." So, to destroy the man who controlled the world, Kassandra needed to burn his grain.'

General_Description: '''Fourth-Degree Burns''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra was tasked with with destroying [[Lagos]]' grain supplies.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra made her way to [[Lagos' Compound]] in the shadow of [[Mount Psophis]].
*'''Kassandra:''' ''These must be the silos. There's enough grain in here to feed hundreds of hungry soldiers.''
She drew close and inspected the silos.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That hatch on top looks like it'll burn, and the wheat will catch fire.''
Kassandra infiltrated the camp and positioned herself best to set the first silo alight. It exploded in a burst of burning wheat.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Good, now two more left to burn.''
She set fire to the second silo.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Only one left.''
She destroyed the final silo.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That settles it. Without grain, [[Lagos]] won't be able to feed his troops—or pay for more.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra set fire to Lagos' grain stockpile, crippling his ability to fund and feed an army.
Section_Trivia: *Completing the quest reduces Lagos' persistent bounty, as the quest chips away at his ability to fund it. Together with [[Gluten Free]] and [[Breaking Bread]], this can remove up to two of the three helmets before dealing with Lagos and lifting the bounty altogether.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
